biotools.summary:
a web server and R package for visualizing cis and trans RNA-RNA, RNA-DNA and DNA-DNA interactions.

A web server and R package for plotting RNA secondary structures, trans RNA-RNA, RNA-DNA and DNA-DNA interactions and genomic interactions.

R-chie allows you to make arc diagrams of RNA secondary structures, allowing for easy comparison and overlap of two structures, rank and display basepairs in colour and to also visualize corresponding multiple sequence alignments and co-variation information.

bioschemas.name: R-chie
